narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Real House Behavioral Services INC is a Clinic/Center, Adult Mental Health provider based in Montclair, NJ. From 2023-08 through 2024-12, this provider received $261K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 997 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.6× the national median for 90834 (90834), at $105 per claim vs. the median of $64, placing them above the 75th percentile.
82% of billing is concentrated in 90834 (90834), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending more than doubled from $51K in 2023 to $210K in 2024 (313% growth).
Saw a 4.1× spike in 2024 ($51K → $210K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
